actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for the coverage, under the supplementary medical insurance benefits program established by part B of such title, of one routine physical checkup each year and for preventive care for individuals insured under such program.

summary.text: Extends coverage, under the supplementary medical insurance benefits program established by title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act, for one routine physical checkup, including diagnostic tests, each year and for preventive and maintenance care for individuals insured under such program.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for the coverage, under the supplementary medical insurance benefits program established by part B of such title, of one routine physical checkup each year and for preventive care for individuals insured under such program.
